Friends,Â Romans, Countrymen of the internetâ¦

I regret to inform you that despite the best efforts of my tech savvy sibling and a team of snippy Dell technical support agents, Taquito has apparently implodedâ¦for good this time.

It goes now to the land beyond the veil of the blue screen of death, where updates are free and plentiful and no where no viruses or malware can reach it. It takes with it all of my files and has left me only with the bittersweet memories of our time together as solace.

Good night sweet Taquito. I wish I had backed you up. Â  Â  Â 

I tried, but it was already too late.

That’s beautifully written, if terrible news. I hope you get a new computer soon, whyifail!
regular-title: The Passing Of Taquito the Laptop
